title: Glenn was great to deal with and very…
text: Glenn was great to deal with and very understanding when it was difficult to find the necessary papers needed to proceed.  The final paperwork was very quick.  However, PLEASE do not state that the closing papers within your website need to be reviewed AND PRINTED, because I wasted so much ink and paper.  Just state "PLEASE RECEIVED BEFORE THE CLOSING."

title: Clear and timely instructions
text: Clear and timely instructions, from soft approval to final commitment. I am self-employed for 20 years and the only strange/riduculus request was about the date of my company being incorporated. I moved from MA to RI and had to register in RI when we changed the tax status of the business from LLC to S-corp. I provided all the official (legal) documents from RI Sect. of State and they still insisted a letter from my CPA firm. The problem was the application was in the final days before the Oct 15th filing deadline for deferred tax returns - second busiest period for accountants. I do not understand the insistance of the letter when all the legal documents were provided. The CPA letter is meaningless compared to the legal filings with the government.

title: Quick & Painless
text: The whole experience, from start to finish, was fast, easy, and very professional. My Representative, Garrett Miller, kept in touch with every step of the process. He quickly returned my calls or texts with any questions I had, but there really weren't many questions!! This whole process was quick and painless!!!

title: Frank is a 5 star fiduciary
text: Frank is a 5 star fiduciary. Made me feel comfortable with all the details of my loan and calmed the nerves when stress was high. Communication is excellent! Friendly as well. Closing was easy. Got my funds and checks 4 business days after closing.

title: Outstanding Experience with Rocket Mortgage!
text: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ "We recently did a cash-out refinance on our home with Rocket Mortgage, and the experience couldn’t have been better! The entire process was smooth, straightforward, and moved along quickly, but Alyssa from Detroit, MI, deserves special recognition. Alyssa was an absolute superstar! She went above and beyond, guiding us step-by-step, explaining every detail, and answering all our questions with patience and clarity. Her professionalism and support made the whole experience truly exceptional. Without a doubt, one of the best financial experiences we've ever had! Rocket Mortgage and Alyssa are highly recommended!

title: Rocket Mortgage
text: Adam Ali was incredibly kind, patient, and went above and beyond to make our refinance a reality. He took the time to listen to all our questions and, if he didn’t have an immediate answer, ensured we were connected with someone who did. Every team member we worked with at Rocket Mortgage went the extra mile to make us feel valued and appreciated as customers.

title: Excellent Experience
text: The whole process was excellent. Everyone was very helpful and if we had any question they were answered quickly. Even the closing process was streamlined. Documents were pre-signed and the streaming on camera closing only took around a half hour. Thank you Rocket Mortgage!

title: Good experience
text: Everything went smoothly and it was very easy.  The only little glitch was when we first discussed the bills to be paid off,  we were NOT informed of the change to the bills initially discussed after the appraisal of the house came in a little lower than expected by Rocket Mortgage.   So, we were a little surprised that several accounts were not included in the payoff until after everything was signed and completed.   Other than that,  everything went well.

title: Mortgage
text: MortgageWhen I first applied for a mortgage from Rocket,, the one thing that I didn’t like about their process was that it was impersonal and it felt disconnected.  I felt like my questions and needs weren’t being addressed and I lost a deposit in the process.  Fast forward to 2024.. even though hesitant I decided to give them a second try and this time I was more educated about the process.  I was pleasantly surprised with how smoothly the process was .. from beginning to end.  I was always made aware of where I was in the process of obtaining my mortgage.. I didn’t have to wait for answers..and I felt heard and understood.  I am pleased that they made changes that allowed for a pleasant experience in homeownership.  Would definitely recommend and reuse their services in the future if the need arise.

title: While your company exceeded most of my…
text: While your company exceeded most of my expectations I would have liked the personal touch throughout (for instance my refinance was a debt consolidation) secured by the equity in my paid for home). The client services function I had to pursue on my own to status when the checks I would receive to pay my creditors off would be received and If I would be able to track their receipt to me.! Shouldn’t have had to pursue them - that process should have been made clear in writing. It wasn’t  made clear leaving me to have to pursue from my loan officer how it worked. We’re talking thousands of dollars in checks to me to pay off my creditors and being left in the dark on the matter after closing had occurred. Kind of scary- right?
